:orphan:

.. _general_examples

Examples
========

General Examples
-----------------

General purpose and introductory examples for mcmodels.

Modified `Scikit-Learn <http://scikit-learn.org/stable/index.html>`_ Examples
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following examples are modified `examples <http://scikit-learn.org/
stable/auto_examples/index.html>`_ from the package `Scikit-Learn <http://
scikit-learn.org/stable/index.html>`_ licensed under the `New BSD (3-clause)
License <https://github.com/scikit-learn/scikit-learn/blob/master/COPYING>`_
reproduced in the each of the following scripts:

- :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_nadaraya_watson.py`
- :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_nonnegative_ridge_path.py`
- :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_nonnegative_linear_ridge_variance.py`

        :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_nonnegative_ridge_path.py`

    </div>
